Keywords: Deity , Detective , Mystical , Ruler
Real Name: Absolon Zebardyn Mercator
Special Powers
I PREFER TO HEAL, BUT SOMETIMES I HAVE TO HURT: STOP. Regeneration. // At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character and roll a d6. 5-6: Deal that character 2 penetrating damage.
I THOUGHT I WAS A SAVIOR, BUT TURNS OUT I'M A DESTROYER: Exploit Weakness, Support.

Comments
August 27, 2022
Maxphyte
I get why people are disappointed in this figure considering the fact that this is an Omega level mutant. But I consistently find myself using this figure the past month or so at my venue. Maybe it’s the old school player in me who always wanted a healer like this. But he has been doing well enough where I keep building with him. If a bizarro event ever comes up… I’m definitely trying him out.
July 5, 2022
RockyRaccoon
he could make for good mastermind fodder until he gets to that STOP click. But then again, once he gets there, he's really easy to KO with only Regeneration being his only defense. 18 isn't terrible especially for the last click, but it's still not difficult to get through that so by the time he does get there, any smart opponent would likely get rid of him before he even has the chance to use that power. Unless if you manage to position him in a way where he cannot be attacked and is only used as Mastermind fodder until that point, which is a good strategy I think.
July 5, 2022
hoojeebo
Insane...ly inaccurate, yeah! This is an Omega-level mutant who doesn't fly, doesn't move and attack, and has a nice STOP click, but that's about it. I've been waiting for this character to be made for quite some time, and I am nothing but disappointed in this dial.
July 5, 2022
Mattlikethepaint
Support is nice, the last click is very good but he seems too ignorable to get to that point. I guess you want him to get hit to the stop click then run as far away as possible, as there's no range or line or fire necessary for the penetrating damage. Sadly I don't think most opponents would give you the chance. I might be missing something.
July 2, 2022
corbyn15
Um.....Is it just me or is this insane?
